name: Sentiments Attachés
description:
" Sentiments attachés " is a 2d pixel art game in top-down view. Your goal is to set a healthy relationship with your friends, while breaking a bad one. You'll have to run through a bullet hell world to find "red flags", indicators of a bad relationship, and show them to your true friends in order to complete the game. 

( Made in 2 days during The GMTK GameJam 2021 !!! )

Peoples who worked on this game : 

- Elvyn : me, programming 

- Yanappu : art, programming 

- Ekotedepoulet : art

- Anathael : ideas all over the place

The (amazing) banner for this game have been made by Nixop in less than an hour, big thanks to him.
